name: nativescript-extend
description: Nativescript extend tool pack, helps Nativescript developers create cross-platform mobiles easliy with the support of snippets, a xml validator and a run emulator from VSCode

NativescriptExtend.emulatorPath.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator script.

NativescriptExtend.enable.snippets.description: The will enable snippet for the xml, vue and html files

NativescriptExtend.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the XML language server.

NativescriptExtend.logs.client.description: Should the server log to client output

NativescriptExtend.format.splitAttribute.description: Split multiple attributes each onto a new line

NativescriptExtend.format.joinCDATALines.description: Join lines in a CDATA tag's content

NativescriptExtend.format.spaceBeforeEmp.description:
Insert space before end of self closing tag. 
Example:
  <tag/> -> <tag />

NativescriptExtend.format.joinContentLin.description: Normalize the whitespace of content inside an element. Newlines and excess whitespace are removed.

NativescriptExtend.format.preserveEmptyC.description: Preserve empty content/whitespace in a tag.

NativescriptExtend.format.preservedNewli.description: Preserve new lines that separate tags. The value represents the maximum number of new lines per section. A value of 0 removes all new lines.

NativescriptExtend.format.quotations.description: Which type of quotes to use for attribute values when formatting.

systemId.description: The path or URL to the XML schema (XSD or DTD)

pattern.description:
File glob pattern. Example: **/*.Format.ps1xml

More information on the glob syntax: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/io/fileOps.html#glob
pattern.markdownDescription:
File glob pattern. Example: `**/*.Format.ps1xml`

More information on the glob syntax: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/io/fileOps.html#glob

NativescriptExtend.completion.autoCloseT.description:
Enable/disable autoclosing of XML tags. 

IMPORTANT: Turn off editor.autoClosingTags for this to work

NativescriptExtend.server.vmargs.description: Specifies extra VM arguments used to launch the XML Language Server. Eg. use `-noverify -Xmx1G  -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+UseStringDeduplication` to bypass class verification, increase the heap size to 1GB and enable String deduplication with the G1 Garbage collector

NativescriptExtend.server.workDir.description: Set a custom folder path for cached XML Schemas. An absolute path is expected, although the ~ prefix (for the user home directory) is supported.

NativescriptExtend.validation.noGrammar.description: The message severity when a document has no associated grammar.

NativescriptExtend.validation.schema.description: Enable/disable schema based validation. Ignored if "xml.validation.enabled": false.
